markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armor Latches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1824)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Adjustment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=380" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This armor is easily doffed. A set of armor with armor latches gains the [noisy](/Traits.aspx?ID=205) trait; you can't add latches to armor that already possesses the noisy trait. You can remove a set of armor with armor latches with a 3-action activity, which has the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait. This doesn't affect the [time it takes to don the armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=200).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Armor Latches
